jobs.title: Software Engineer
details: Spearheaded enhancements for web applications dedicated to monitoring space debris, bolstering accuracy and user experience.
Led improvements to both web and Thick Client applications for Strategy and Assessment, trusted tools of the U.S. Air Force and the Royal Canadian Air Force.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
details: Bolstered the performance of satellite management applications through advanced algorithm optimization and augmented the Thick Client with innovative features.
Pioneered a lightweight web application alternative, catering to users operating on constrained hardware, offering an efficient replacement to the Thick Client.

jobs.title: Associate Software Engineer
details: Provided expert support for legacy applications focused on non-marketing communications processing.
Enhanced application reliability by elevating test coverage and enriching documentation for better clarity and usability.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
details: Designed and implemented 30+ microservices for efficient non-marketing communications, handling millions of records daily.
Led the effort to transition communications from Mainframe systems to a modernized platform.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Led the creation of a proxy sidecar service, enhancing Enterprise services with standardized, intuitive logging, advanced security measures, and seamless service discovery.
Directed the design of an InnerSource dashboard, facilitating developers in effortlessly discovering and disseminating libraries and tools enterprise-wide.
Commanded the technical direction of a robust microservice platform tailored for non-marketing communications, processing in excess of one million records daily.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
details: Oversaw the design and implementation of a comprehensive search functionality, empowering security teams and auditors with deep codebase access and scrutiny.
Spearheaded the development and oversight of a remote code execution platform, analogous to CI build agents.
Engineered the platformâ€™s flexibility to operate across multiple run-times, including Kubernetes and Firecracker.
Fostered client relationships through direct engagements, effectively troubleshooting and resolving issues.
Pioneered the integration of a feature enabling the execution of diverse file types within the Batch Changes product.
Support a number of customers with troubleshooting and resolving issues.
